hero.heroDescription: Connect with qualified doctors, manage health records digitally, and get quality healthcare from anywhere in India. Built specifically for rural and underserved communities.

features.title: Comprehensive Healthcare Solutions
features.description: Everything you need for quality healthcare delivery, from appointment booking to digital records management.
features.smartAppointmentDesc: AI-powered scheduling system that matches patients with available doctors based on specialty, location, and urgency.
features.hdConsultationsDesc: Crystal clear video calls with screen sharing, digital prescription, and real-time health monitoring capabilities.
features.digitalRecordsDesc: Secure, encrypted storage of medical history, lab reports, prescriptions, and treatment plans accessible anywhere.
features.aiAssistantDesc: Multilingual AI chatbot for symptom checking, medication reminders, and 24/7 health guidance.
features.mobileFirstDesc: Optimized for smartphones with offline capabilities for areas with limited internet connectivity.
features.multilingualSupportDesc: Available in Hindi, English, and 10+ regional languages to serve diverse rural communities across India.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Get started with quality healthcare in just three simple steps.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create your account with Aadhaar verification and complete your medical profile for personalized care.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose your doctor, select appointment time, and get instant confirmation with video call details.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Attend video consultation, receive digital prescription, and access all records in your health dashboard.

benefits.title: Benefits for Everyone
benefits.description: HealthConnect Pro delivers value to patients, doctors, and healthcare institutions.
benefits.patientBenefit1: Access to specialist doctors from anywhere

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about HealthConnect Pro.
faq.faq1Q: How secure is my medical data on HealthConnect Pro?
faq.faq1A: We use bank-grade encryption and comply with all healthcare data protection regulations. Your medical records are stored securely and only accessible by authorized healthcare providers.
faq.faq2Q: Can I use HealthConnect Pro without internet connectivity?
faq.faq2A: Yes, our mobile app has offline capabilities. You can access your health records, medication reminders, and basic features even without internet. Data syncs automatically when you're back online.
faq.faq3Q: How do I book an appointment with a specialist doctor?
faq.faq3A: Simply select the medical specialty, choose your preferred doctor, pick an available time slot, and confirm your appointment. You'll receive confirmation via SMS and email.
faq.faq4Q: Is HealthConnect Pro available in my local language?
faq.faq4A: Yes, we support Hindi, English, and 10+ regional Indian languages including Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, and more. You can switch languages anytime in the app.
faq.faq5Q: What if I need emergency medical consultation?
faq.faq5A: Our platform offers 24/7 emergency consultation services. Click the emergency button to connect with the next available doctor within minutes.
faq.faq6Q: How much does it cost to use HealthConnect Pro?
faq.faq6A: Basic registration is free. Video consultations start from â‚¹199, which is significantly cheaper than visiting specialists in cities. We also accept government health insurance.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Healthcare Access?
cta.description: Join thousands of patients and doctors already using HealthConnect Pro to deliver quality healthcare to rural communities across India.
